PerfectNetExp.abs: roughhew 粗凿roughhewn 粗凿的roughhouse 大吵大闹
rove中文由英汉互译在线翻译独家整理提供,包括rove中文、rove的翻译等,内容丰富准确。...  粗削的roughhewn 粗纺线 rove slub 粗纱roving... - a rove 认可;赞成.

entry.tran: (木材)粗砍的;(石头)粗凿的;未打磨的
entry.def: Rough-hewn wood or stone has been cut into a shape but has not yet been smoothed or finished off.

example.ex: It is a rough-hewn carving of a cat's head.
example.tran: 这是一个猫头雕像的毛坯。

means.word_mean: 1. of stone or timber; shaped roughly without finishing

auth_sentence.content: It's an inherently paradoxical style, calculatedly ungainly, terse, and fluid at once call it Polished Roughhewn.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's an inherently paradoxical style, calculatedly ungainly, terse, and fluid at once call it Polished Roughhewn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's an inherently paradoxical style, calculatedly ungainly, terse, and fluid at once call it Polished Roughhewn.
